title:
In December I submitted a question - prior to construction of the PPD building, what was the tallest building in Wilmington? - I received an email from MyReporter that said the question would be answered soon, but has not been to the best of my knowledge.

Did MyReporter decide the question wasn\'t worth answering?
text:
No, we aren't ignoring you. Back during the holidays, we got
backlogged with some things and we've had reporters busy with other
projects, but we're trying to catch up. Thanks for your patience.
